${modID}:NonCardKeywords.NAME: Fake
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Gain [E] if you have no Block.

${modID}:Cannonfire.NAME: Fire!
${modID}:Cannonfire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bleached. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Purge.

${modID}:DarkPaladinSkull.NAME: Dark Paladin
${modID}:DarkPaladinSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: While he exudes an aura of bloodthirsty vengeance, he actually has a soft spot for stuffed animals - especially cats.

${modID}:WerewolfSkull.NAME: Werewolf
${modID}:WerewolfSkull.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Passive: Deal damage equal to your ${modID}:Total_Cards when *Reshuffling. NL ${modID}:Bonepile: Draw and randomly discard 1 card. NL ${modID}:Swap: *Reshuffle.
${modID}:WerewolfSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Loaded up on caffeine and ADHD medication, the only thing stopping him from ascending to a higher plane is the Sundial he won't let go of.

${modID}:FrostSkull.NAME: Frost Skull
${modID}:FrostSkull.DESCRIPTION: *Passive: Give Block lost at the start of the turn to ALL enemies. NL *Bonepile: Gain 1 ${modID}:Frozen. NL *Swap: Channel 2 ${modID}:Blizzards.
${modID}:FrostSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: He was informed that he'd need glasses to fix his poor socketsight, so he opted for the coolest pair he could find.

${modID}:BomberSkull.NAME: Skeleton-Bomber
${modID}:BomberSkull.DESCRIPTION: Given that he's not supposed to be exposed like this, he's a little afraid right now.
${modID}:BomberSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You might want to be careful, he already planned to blow himself up when he was calm.

${modID}:LittleBoneSkull.NAME: Little Bone
${modID}:LittleBoneSkull.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Passive: Take 1 less damage. NL ${modID}:Bonepile: Gain 2 Block. NL ${modID}:Swap: Gain [E] [E] .
${modID}:LittleBoneSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: We suggest guarding your shins before attempting to engage the skeleton.

${modID}:PettyThiefSkull.NAME: Petty Thief
${modID}:PettyThiefSkull.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Passive: Gaining *Gold randomly deals that much damage. NL ${modID}:Bonepile: Gain 4 *Gold. NL ${modID}:Swap: Block damage with twice as much *Gold this turn.
${modID}:PettyThiefSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: He wishes he could rob you again, but there's only so many times he can put your wallet back before it gets boring.

${modID}:ShieldSkull.NAME: Skeleton-Shield
${modID}:ShieldSkull.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Passive: *Dexterity doubles as *Thorns. NL ${modID}:Bonepile: *Channel 1 ${modID}:Barrier. NL ${modID}:Swap: Gain 5 *Dexterity until next turn.
${modID}:ShieldSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: A mighty warrior whose legendary shield never once failed to deflect an attack. Failing to block, however...

${modID}:HunterSkull.NAME: Hunter
${modID}:HunterSkull.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Passive: *Attacks Channel an ${modID}:Arrow. NL ${modID}:Bonepile: Channel 1 ${modID}:Arrow. NL ${modID}:Swap: Gain an empty orb slot.
${modID}:HunterSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shooting the apple off his own head didn't go so well the first time, but he was able to practice until he got it right.

${modID}:ClownSkull.NAME: Clown
${modID}:ClownSkull.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Passive: Your first card each turn costs 0. NL ${modID}:Bonepile: Add an ${modID}:Imitation to your hand. NL ${modID}:Swap: *Bonepile 2.
${modID}:ClownSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Off with his head! Well, it's not very productive, but it is dramatic.

${modID}:GreatWarlockSkull.NAME: Great Warlock
${modID}:GreatWarlockSkull.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Passive: Attack damage applies *Concentration. NL ${modID}:Bonepile: Reduce ALL ${modID}:Concentration. NL ${modID}:Swap: Remove ALL *Concentration.
${modID}:GreatWarlockSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: He will obliterate you! Just...give him a few hours to get the spell ready.

${modID}:MageSkull.NAME: Mage
${modID}:MageSkull.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Passive: *Skills grant 2 Vigor. NL ${modID}:Bonepile: Apply ${modID}:Burn randomly. NL ${modID}:Swap: Create an *Awakening.
${modID}:MageSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Master chef. Everything he cooks is grilled to black, inedible perfection.

${modID}:WarriorSkull.NAME: Warrior
${modID}:WarriorSkull.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Passive: Gain [E] after playing a *Strike. NL ${modID}:Bonepile: Gain 1 ${modID}:Charge. NL ${modID}:Swap: Gain 5 ${modID}:Charge.
${modID}:WarriorSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Some call it copyright infingement. We elect to call it creative reimagining of the story.

${modID}:ChampionSkull.NAME: Champion
${modID}:ChampionSkull.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Passive: ${modID}:Counterattack unblocked damage. NL ${modID}:Bonepile: Heal the next 3 HP you lose. NL ${modID}:Swap: Enter or Exit Wrath.
${modID}:ChampionSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: He's #1, or at least that's as high as he can count. Just don't tell him we said that.

${modID}:DavyJonesSkull.NAME: Davy Jones
${modID}:DavyJonesSkull.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Passive: Gain Vigor on *Evoke. NL ${modID}:Bonepile: *Channel a ${modID}:Cannonball. NL ${modID}:Swap: *Channel 4 *Cannonballs.
${modID}:DavyJonesSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: I walked the plank once, and I'll walk it again! What will it do? Drown me again?

${modID}:GamblerSkull.NAME: Gambler
${modID}:GamblerSkull.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Passive: ${modID}:Gamble when you play cards. NL ${modID}:Bonepile: Shuffle a *Loaded *Dice into your draw pile. NL ${modID}:Swap: *Passive chance doubles this turn.
${modID}:GamblerSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: He'll definitely win the next one. He can't lose 100 in a row, right? He just needs a small loan...

${modID}:LoadedDice.NAME: Loaded Dice
${modID}:LoadedDice.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Purge. NL Draw 1 card. NL Your next attack this turn deals !M!% more damage.
${modID}:LoadedDice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Purge. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Your next attack this turn deals !M!% more damage.

${modID}:TheOneRing.NAME: The Ring
${modID}:TheOneRing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TheFifthMeteor.NAME: Full Charge
${modID}:TheFifthMeteor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL Gain !M! Temporary Focus. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:TheFifthMeteor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL Gain !M! Temporary Focus. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Awakening.NAME: Awakening
${modID}:Awakening.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bleached. Ethereal. NL Deal !M! non-attack damage !${modID}:VIG! times, equal to your Vigor, and remove it.
${modID}:Awakening.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bleached. Ethereal. NL Deal !M! non-attack damage !${modID}:VIG! times, equal to your Vigor, and remove it.

${modID}:LetsKnitTogether.NAME: Let's...Knit...
${modID}:LetsKnitTogether.DESCRIPTION: You and the target gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Bonepile !M!.
${modID}:LetsKnitTogether.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You and the target gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Bonepile !M!.

${modID}:ThrowHead.NAME: Throw Head
${modID}:ThrowHead.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! ${modID}:Empty_Head. NL Becomes *Recall *Head in your discard pile.
${modID}:ThrowHead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! ${modID}:Empty_Head. NL Becomes *Recall *Head+ in your discard pile.

${modID}:StarterKit.NAME: Starter Kit
${modID}:StarterKit.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! *Gold. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Ripped_Pocket. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:StarterKit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! *Gold. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Ripped_Pocket. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RecallHead.NAME: Recall Head
${modID}:RecallHead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Channel !M! ${modID}:Empty_Head.  NL Becomes *Throw *Head in your hand.
${modID}:RecallHead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Channel !M! ${modID}:Empty_Head.  NL Becomes *Throw *Head+ in your hand.

${modID}:FreeDamage.NAME: Tax Strike
${modID}:FreeDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Channel !M! ${modID}:Empty_Head.
${modID}:FreeDamage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Channel !M! ${modID}:Empty_Head.

${modID}:PatternRecognition.NAME: Pattern  Recognition
${modID}:PatternRecognition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Channel !M! ${modID}:Empty_Head. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WaitToStrike.NAME: Wait To Strike
${modID}:WaitToStrike.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor. NL If you haven't played an *Attack this turn, gain !M! more.
${modID}:WaitToStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor. NL If you haven't played an *Attack this turn, gain !M! more.

${modID}:PowerStrike.NAME: Power Strike
${modID}:PowerStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs !M! less when ${modID}:Charged.
${modID}:PowerStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs !M! less when ${modID}:Charged.

${modID}:RisingSlash.NAME: Rising Slash
${modID}:RisingSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! time. NL Draw 1 card.
${modID}:RisingSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Draw 1 card.

${modID}:Concentration.NAME: Focused Strike
${modID}:Concentration.DESCRIPTION: Discard an *Attack. NL Gain Vigor equal to its damage. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Concentration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard an *Attack. NL Gain Vigor equal to its damage.

${modID}:Bribe.NAME: Bribe
${modID}:Bribe.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Pay 20 *Gold. NL ${modID}:Bonepile !M!. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Bribe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Pay 10 *Gold. NL ${modID}:Bonepile !M!. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Backstab.NAME: Backstab
${modID}:Backstab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then gain the same amount of *Gold up to !M!.
${modID}:Backstab.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then gain the same amount of *Gold up to !M!.

${modID}:ThrowGold.NAME: Throw Gold
${modID}:ThrowGold.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Pay 20 *Gold. NL Deal !D! damage, equal to the *Gold gained this combat. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ThrowGold.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Pay 10 *Gold. NL Deal !D! damage, equal to the *Gold gained this combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Thief.NAME: Street Thievery
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! *Gold. NL Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:DirtySmash.NAME: Dirty Smash
${modID}:DirtySmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL While in *Wrath, deal damage again and exit *Wrath.
${modID}:DirtySmash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL While in *Wrath, deal damage again and exit *Wrath.

${modID}:OneInchPunch.NAME: One-Inch Punch
${modID}:OneInchPunch.DESCRIPTION: Become *Entangled unless you're in *Wrath. NL ${modID}:Bonepile !M!. NL Draw 1 card.
${modID}:OneInchPunch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Become *Entangled unless you're in *Wrath. NL ${modID}:Bonepile !M!. NL Draw 1 card.

${modID}:QuickStep.NAME: Quick Step
${modID}:QuickStep.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bonepile !M!. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak.
${modID}:QuickStep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bonepile !M!. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:TechnicalJab.NAME: Technical Jab
${modID}:TechnicalJab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, equal to your missing health. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:TechnicalJab.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, equal to your missing health.

${modID}:Combo.NAME: Combo
${modID}:Combo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL ${modID}:Bonepile X times. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Combo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL ${modID}:Bonepile X times. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RainOfDarts.NAME: Rain of Darts
${modID}:RainOfDarts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies between 0 and !M! times.
${modID}:RainOfDarts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies between 0 and !M! times.

${modID}:RussianRoulette.NAME: Russian Roulette
${modID}:RussianRoulette.DESCRIPTION: Randomly ${modID}:Gamble !M! times, deal !D! damage, or take !${modID}:GSD! damage. NL Draw 1 card.
${modID}:RussianRoulette.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Randomly ${modID}:Gamble !M! times, deal !D! damage, or take !${modID}:GSD! damage. NL Draw 1 card.

${modID}:RigTheGame.NAME: Rig The Game
${modID}:RigTheGame.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! card from your draw pile to your hand. NL Put !M! card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RigTheGame.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! card from your draw pile to your hand. NL Put !M! card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

${modID}:DoomedDance.NAME: Doomed Dance
${modID}:DoomedDance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block each turn. If you take unblocked damage, that Block becomes Poison.
${modID}:DoomedDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block each turn. If you take unblocked damage, that Block becomes Constrict.

${modID}:ShieldCharge.NAME: Shield Charge
${modID}:ShieldCharge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block next turn.
${modID}:ShieldCharge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block next turn.

${modID}:TheBestOffense.NAME: The Best Offense
${modID}:TheBestOffense.DESCRIPTION: Convert your Block into Dexterity until your next turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:TheBestOffense.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Convert your Block into Dexterity until your next turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ShieldSmash.NAME: Shield Smash
${modID}:ShieldSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, based on your current Block. NL ${modID}:Bonepile !M!.
${modID}:ShieldSmash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, based on your current Block. NL ${modID}:Bonepile !M!.

${modID}:BombsAway.NAME: Bombs Away!
${modID}:BombsAway.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain Block equal to the unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:BombsAway.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain Block equal to the unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:PrepareForBoarding.NAME: Prepare For Boarding!
${modID}:PrepareForBoarding.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !M! cards to gain !B! Block for each.

${modID}:IAmTheSea.NAME: Everwinter
${modID}:IAmTheSea.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! ${modID}:Blizzard NL Channel !M! ${modID}:Blizzard at the start of the turn.
${modID}:IAmTheSea.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Channel !M! ${modID}:Blizzard NL Channel !M! ${modID}:Blizzard at the start of the turn.

${modID}:Speedrun.NAME: Speedrun
${modID}:Speedrun.DESCRIPTION: *Reshuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.
${modID}:Speedrun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Reshuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.

${modID}:PiercingShot.NAME: Piercing Shot
${modID}:PiercingShot.DESCRIPTION: Target loses !D! HP. NL This HP loss scales as damage. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:PiercingShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Target loses !D! HP. NL This HP loss scales as damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SiegeShot.NAME: Siege Shot
${modID}:SiegeShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply that much Lock-On.
${modID}:SiegeShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply that much Lock-On.

${modID}:DarkSanctuary.NAME: Dark Sanctuary
${modID}:DarkSanctuary.DESCRIPTION: Take 4 damage !M! times. NL Gain !B! Block.
${modID}:DarkSanctuary.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Take 4 damage !M! times. NL Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:DarkCross.NAME: Dark Cross
${modID}:DarkCross.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain Block equal to your Vigor and ${modID}:Oblivion.
${modID}:DarkCross.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain Block equal to your Vigor and ${modID}:Oblivion.

${modID}:RageMode.NAME: Rage Form
${modID}:RageMode.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Wrath is !M! times as effective. NL Prevent *Fatal damage in Wrath once.
${modID}:RageMode.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Wrath is !M! times as effective. NL Prevent *Fatal damage in Wrath once.

${modID}:AbyssForm.NAME: Abyss Form
${modID}:AbyssForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL ${modID}:Concentration damages ALL enemies an additional time when removed.
${modID}:AbyssForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Concentration damages ALL enemies an additional time when removed.

${modID}:SniperForm.NAME: Sniper Form
${modID}:SniperForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL *Attacks apply Lock-On. NL *Skills grant Temporary Focus. NL *Attack damage is 3.
${modID}:SniperForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Attacks apply Lock-On. NL *Skills grant Temporary Focus. NL *Attack damage is 3.

${modID}:SageForm.NAME: Sage Form
${modID}:SageForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Applying a power to an enemy deals 3 damage.
${modID}:SageForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Applying a power to an enemy deals 3 damage.

${modID}:EternalForm.NAME: Eternal Form
${modID}:EternalForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Drawing a card ${modID}:Mills a card.

${modID}:DistantHope.NAME: Ascender's Bane
${modID}:DistantHope.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL Cannot be removed from your deck.
${modID}:DistantHope.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: It may not be Ascender's Bane, but it had you fooled didn't it?

${modID}:EntertainerForm.NAME: Joker Form
${modID}:EntertainerForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL The first time each turn you play an ${modID}:Imitation, ${modID}:Bonepile.
${modID}:EntertainerForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first time each turn you play an ${modID}:Imitation, ${modID}:Bonepile.

${modID}:Hunt.NAME: Hunt
${modID}:Hunt.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, play the top card of your draw pile and discard a random card.
${modID}:Hunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, play the top card of your draw pile and replace it with a random card in your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Next time, ${modID}:Bonepile !M! times instead.
${modID}:Bonepile !M! times. NL Next time, draw !M! cards instead.

${modID}:Predation.NAME: Predation
${modID}:Predation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, raise your Max HP by !M!. NL Fleeting.
${modID}:Predation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, raise your Max HP by !M!. NL Fleeting.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !M! cards. NL Next time, draw twice as many cards.
Draw !SUV! cards. NL Next time, discard up to !M! cards.

${modID}:JackInTheBox.NAME: Jack-In-The-Box!
${modID}:JackInTheBox.DESCRIPTION: Your next card will be played as if it were X-Cost, based on its cost. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:JackInTheBox.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next card will be played as if it were X-Cost, based on its cost. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SurpriseKnives.NAME: Surprise Knives!
${modID}:SurpriseKnives.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Gain [E] equal to their combined cost. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SurpriseKnives.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Gain [E] equal to their combined cost.

${modID}:ChainStrike.NAME: Chain Strike
${modID}:ChainStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return this card to your hand whenever you play a *Strike except *Chain *Strike.
${modID}:ChainStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return this card to your hand whenever you play a *Strike except *Chain *Strike.

${modID}:FireArrow.NAME: Fire Arrow
${modID}:FireArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Burn. If the target is already Burned, remove it and gain half as much Vigor instead.
${modID}:FireArrow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Burn. If the target is already Burned, remove it and gain half as much Vigor instead.

${modID}:AbyssOrb.NAME: Abyss Orb

${modID}:AbyssOrb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Becomes *Abyss *Spike+ in your hand.

${modID}:AbyssSpike.NAME: Abyss Spike

${modID}:AbyssSpike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Becomes *Abyss *Orb+ in your hand.

${modID}:Momentum.NAME: Momentum Strike
${modID}:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! more damage each time it's drawn or discarded.
${modID}:Momentum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! more damage each time it's drawn or discarded.

${modID}:RapidChannel.NAME: Rapid Channel
${modID}:RapidChannel.DESCRIPTION: Borrow !M! [E] from future turns. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RapidChannel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Borrow !M! [E] from future turns. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AvengerForm.NAME: Avenger Form
${modID}:AvengerForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain [E] the first time you take or Block damage during your turn.
${modID}:AvengerForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] the first time you take or Block damage during your turn.

${modID}:WarlordForm.NAME: Warlord Form
${modID}:WarlordForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL The first *Strike you play each turn has its cost reduced by !M! this combat.
${modID}:WarlordForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first *Strike you play each turn has its cost reduced by !M! this combat.

${modID}:AllInForm.NAME: All-In Form
${modID}:AllInForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of their turn, EVERYONE ${modID}:Gambles !M! times. NL If an enemy wins a *Gamble, *Gambler does too.
${modID}:AllInForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of their turn, EVERYONE ${modID}:Gambles !M! times. NL If an enemy wins a *Gamble, *Gambler does too.

${modID}:BlackbeardForm.NAME: Nobeard Form
${modID}:BlackbeardForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Retain *Attacks, and Channel !M! ${modID}:Cannonball for each.

${modID}:FrozenSoulForm.NAME: Frozen Soul Form
${modID}:FrozenSoulForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL If you end your turn with [E] , spend it to Channel !M! ${modID}:Blizzards for each [E] left.
${modID}:FrozenSoulForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn with [E] , spend it to Channel !M! ${modID}:Blizzards for each [E] left.

${modID}:GuardianForm.NAME: Guardian Form
${modID}:GuardianForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL For every 50 Block you gain, convert !M! Dexterity to !M! Strength.
${modID}:GuardianForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For every 50 Block you gain, convert !M! Dexterity to !M! Strength.

${modID}:OutlawForm.NAME: Outlaw Form
${modID}:OutlawForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the end of each turn, gain !M! *Gold.
${modID}:OutlawForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, gain !M! *Gold.

${modID}:iFrameForm.NAME: i-Frame Form
${modID}:iFrameForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL After playing !M! attacks, add a random ${modID}:Grapple to your hand.
${modID}:iFrameForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: After playing !M! attacks, add a random ${modID}:Grapple to your hand.

${modID}:PriceOfPower.NAME: Price Of Power
${modID}:PriceOfPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:M2! Block each turn. NL Apply !M! Thorns.
${modID}:PriceOfPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:M2! Block each turn. NL Apply !M! Thorns.

${modID}:YoureHurtingMe.NAME: You're Hurting Me!
${modID}:YoureHurtingMe.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Inflict !M! Weak. NL Purge.
${modID}:YoureHurtingMe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Inflict !M! Weak. NL Purge.

${modID}:Acceleration.NAME: Acceleration
${modID}:Acceleration.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, draw !M! cards and discard this. Next time, exhaust this instead.
${modID}:Acceleration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, draw !M! cards and discard this. Next time, exhaust this instead.

${modID}:AbsoluteSkull.NAME: The Absolute
${modID}:AbsoluteSkull.DESCRIPTION: *Passive: Playing a ${modID}:Grapple grants ${modID}:Herculean_Strength. NL *Bonepile: Complete 3 ${modID}:Labors. NL *Swap: Complete 12 *Labors and play a random *Grapple.
${modID}:AbsoluteSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Not even he could open the pickle jar, no matter how hard he tried.

${modID}:BerserkerSkull.NAME: Berserker
${modID}:BerserkerSkull.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Passive: Losing HP grants as much ${modID}:Unshackled. *Fatal damage less than Strength heals you to half HP and applies ${modID}:Bone_Scream.
${modID}:BerserkerSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: He's got 1 HP and a dream and a whole stack of Vajras to prove it.

${modID}:BoarChase.NAME: Boar Chase
${modID}:BoarChase.DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:BoarChase.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:LionHunt.NAME: Lion Hunt
${modID}:LionHunt.DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:LionHunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Bonepile !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BullFight.NAME: Bull Fight
${modID}:BullFight.DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:BullFight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage divided into !M! hits. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HydraSlam.NAME: Hydra Slam
${modID}:HydraSlam.DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:HydraSlam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FakeHydraSlam.NAME: Hydra Slam
${modID}:FakeHydraSlam.DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:FakeHydraSlam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
Retain. ${modID}:Grapple. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BirthOfAHero.NAME: Birth Of A Hero
${modID}:BirthOfAHero.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an *Attack this turn, gain !M! Block. NL Add a random ${modID}:Grapple to your hand.
${modID}:BirthOfAHero.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an *Attack this turn, gain !M! Block. NL Add a random ${modID}:Grapple to your hand.

${modID}:StrategyBook.NAME: Strategy Book
${modID}:StrategyBook.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Exhaust. NL Your *Leftmost *Unrivaled *Strike gains 1 of !M! effects, otherwise make one.
${modID}:StrategyBook.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Exhaust. NL Your *Leftmost *Unrivaled *Strike gains 1 of !M! effects, otherwise make one.

${modID}:GodOfWarSkull.NAME: The God of War
${modID}:GodOfWarSkull.DESCRIPTION: *Passive: Skills or 0-cost cards grant ${modID}:Tactics. NL *Bonepile: Gain 1 Tactics. NL *Swap: Increase an *Unrivaled *Strike's damage by 5.
${modID}:GodOfWarSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: As both he and his enemies have discovered recently, death could not, in fact, stop him.

${modID}:LaughingArrow.NAME: Laughing Arrow
${modID}:LaughingArrow.DESCRIPTION: Switch the *Unrivaled *Strike between dealing damage and gaining Block.
${modID}:LaughingArrow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Switch the *Unrivaled *Strike between dealing damage and gaining Block.

${modID}:StrengthOf10K.NAME: Strength of 10,000
${modID}:StrengthOf10K.DESCRIPTION: The *Unrivaled *Strike will apply Strength !M! more time.
${modID}:StrengthOf10K.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The *Unrivaled *Strike will apply Strength !M! more times.

${modID}:CeremonialWeapon.NAME: Ceremonial Weapon
${modID}:CeremonialWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Create a new *Unrivaled *Strike on the left of your hand.
${modID}:CeremonialWeapon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a new Upgraded *Unrivaled *Strike on the left of your hand.

${modID}:SixGeneralsFivePasses.NAME: Six Generals, Five Passes
${modID}:SixGeneralsFivePasses.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the *Unrivaled *Strike to draw !M! cards. If it was Blocking, draw 3 more.
${modID}:SixGeneralsFivePasses.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the *Unrivaled *Strike to draw !M! cards. If it was Blocking, draw 3 more.

${modID}:ParasolCharge.NAME: Parasol Charge
${modID}:ParasolCharge.DESCRIPTION: The *Unrivaled *Strike deals !M! more damage. NL If it was Blocking, double this.
${modID}:ParasolCharge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The *Unrivaled *Strike deals !M! more damage. NL If it was Blocking, double this.

${modID}:MatterOfState.NAME: Matter Of State
${modID}:MatterOfState.DESCRIPTION: Discard the *Unrivaled *Strike to gain !B! Block. If it was Blocking, gain !B! Block next turn.
${modID}:MatterOfState.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard the *Unrivaled *Strike to gain !B! Block. If it was Blocking, gain !B! Block next turn.

${modID}:PeerlessBlow.NAME: Peerless Blow
${modID}:PeerlessBlow.DESCRIPTION: The *Unrivaled *Strike hits one enemy, costs 1 more, and refunds double its cost. NL If it was Blocking, gain !M! Temporary Strength.
${modID}:PeerlessBlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The *Unrivaled *Strike hits one enemy, costs 1 more, and refunds double its cost. NL If it was Blocking, gain !M! Temporary Strength.

${modID}:TigerGeneral.NAME: Tiger General
${modID}:TigerGeneral.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the *Unrivaled *Strike to gain !M! Strength. If it was Blocking, gain double.
${modID}:TigerGeneral.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the *Unrivaled *Strike to gain !M! Strength. If it was Blocking, gain double.
